languages.text: "Ты только что сознался, что ваше подобие правосудия — это не демонстрация законной власти и устрашение подданных, а... развлечение". {n}Последнее слово Соломон говорит с отвращением, будто не существует ругательства хуже.{/n}

"You have just confessed that your semblance of justice serves not as a demonstration of lawful authority and deterrence to your subjects, but as... entertainment." {n}Solomorne utters the last word with disgust, as if there could be no fouler profanity.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Ты только что сознался, что ваше подобие правосудия — это не демонстрация законной власти и устрашение подданных, а... развлечение". {n}Последнее слово Соломон говорит с отвращением, будто не существует ругательства хуже.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "You have just confessed that your semblance of justice serves not as a demonstration of lawful authority and deterrence to your subjects, but as... entertainment." {n}Solomorne utters the last word with disgust, as if there could be no fouler profanity.{/n}

"You have just confessed that your semblance of a public execution serves not as a demonstration of justice and deterrence to your subjects, but as... Entertainment." {n}Solomorne utters the last word with disgust, as if there was no fouler profanity.{/n}

"You have just confessed that your semblance of justice serves not as a demonstration of lawful authority and deterrence to your subjects, but as... entertainment." {n}Solomorne utters the last word with disgust, as if there could be no fouler profanity.{/n}

languages.text: “你刚刚已经亲口承认，这种看似正义的行为并不是为了向臣民展示法律与权威，而是某种……娱乐活动。”{n}索罗蒙面露鄙夷地吐出最后四个字，仿佛找不到比这更加亵渎的言论。{/n}
languages.original_text: "You have just confessed that your semblance of justice serves not as a demonstration of lawful authority and deterrence to your subjects, but as... entertainment." {n}Solomorne utters the last word with disgust, as if there could be no fouler profanity.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “你刚刚已经亲口承认，这种看似正义的行为并不是为了向臣民展示法律与权威，而是某种……娱乐活动。”{n}索罗蒙面露鄙夷地吐出最后四个字，仿佛找不到比这更加亵渎的言论。{/n}

languages.text: «Acaba de confesar que este teatrillo de justicia no es una demostración de autoridad legítima ni tiene el propósito de disuadir a sus súbditos, sino que es un mero... espectáculo». {n}Solomorne pronuncia la última palabra con asco, como si no existiera peor blasfemia que esa.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You have just confessed that your semblance of justice serves not as a demonstration of lawful authority and deterrence to your subjects, but as... entertainment." {n}Solomorne utters the last word with disgust, as if there could be no fouler profanity.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Acaba de confesar que este teatrillo de justicia no es una demostración de autoridad legítima ni tiene el propósito de disuadir a sus súbditos, sino que es un mero... espectáculo». {n}Solomorne pronuncia la última palabra con asco, como si no existiera peor blasfemia que esa.{/n}

languages.text: "Adalet görünümünüzün tebaanıza kanuni nizam gösterisi ve caydırıcılık olarak değil de... Eğlence olarak hizmet ettiğini az önce itiraf ettin." {n}Üsteğmen, o son dediğini sanki daha pis bir küfür olamazmış gibi bir tiksintiyle söylüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You have just confessed that your semblance of justice serves not as a demonstration of lawful authority and deterrence to your subjects, but as... entertainment." {n}Solomorne utters the last word with disgust, as if there could be no fouler profanity.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Adalet görünümünüzün tebaanıza kanuni nizam gösterisi ve caydırıcılık olarak değil de... Eğlence olarak hizmet ettiğini az önce itiraf ettin." {n}Üsteğmen, o son dediğini sanki daha pis bir küfür olamazmış gibi bir tiksintiyle söylüyor.{/n}

languages.text: 「お前は、公開処刑が法的権限の示威や臣民への抑止力としてではなく、娯楽として機能していることを告白しただけだ」{n}ソロモーンは、これ以上の口汚い罵りが存在しないかのように、うんざりした様子で最後の言葉を発する。{/n}
languages.original_text: "You have just confessed that your semblance of justice serves not as a demonstration of lawful authority and deterrence to your subjects, but as... entertainment." {n}Solomorne utters the last word with disgust, as if there could be no fouler profanity.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「お前は、公開処刑が正義の示威や臣民への抑止力としてではなく、娯楽としても機能していることを告白しただけだ」{n}ソロモーンは、これ以上の口汚い罵りが存在しないかのように、うんざりした様子で最後の言葉を発する。{/n}

languages.text: « Autrement dit, vous reconnaissez que cette parodie de justice n'est pas vouée à démontrer votre autorité légitime et à dissuader toute velléité dissidente chez vos sujets, mais seulement... à divertir les foules. » {n}Solomorne prononce ces derniers mots avec dégoût, comme s'il ne pouvait exister en ce bas monde plus condamnable obscénité.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You have just confessed that your semblance of justice serves not as a demonstration of lawful authority and deterrence to your subjects, but as... entertainment." {n}Solomorne utters the last word with disgust, as if there could be no fouler profanity.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Autrement dit, vous reconnaissez que cette parodie de justice n'est pas vouée à démontrer votre autorité légitime et à dissuader toute velléité dissidente chez vos sujets, mais seulement... à divertir les foules. » {n}Solomorne prononce ces derniers mots avec dégoût, comme s'il ne pouvait exister en ce bas monde plus condamnable obscénité.{/n}

languages.text: "Ihr habt gerade gestanden, dass Eure Persiflage von Gerechtigkeit nicht zur Demonstration gesetzlicher Autorität und Abschreckung für Eure Untertanen dient, sondern Eurer ... Unterhaltung." {n}Solomorne stößt das letzte Wort voller Ekel aus, als gäbe es keine abscheulichere Gotteslästerung.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You have just confessed that your semblance of justice serves not as a demonstration of lawful authority and deterrence to your subjects, but as... entertainment." {n}Solomorne utters the last word with disgust, as if there could be no fouler profanity.{/n}
